dcterms:description: Action Genome is the largest benchmark for video scene graph generation, built on top of Charades. It contains 476,229 bounding boxes for 35 object classes (without person) and 1,715,568 instances of 26 predicate classes annotated for 234,253 frames.
dcterms:title: Action Genome

dcterms:description: Charades is a dataset for activity understanding, collected through crowdsourcing data collection in home environments.
dcterms:title: Charades
